page.title: 16TRAFFIC IN BUNGAY
page.content: As Bungay is a small town, public transport is limited. There are direct services to Earsham,Halesworth,Southwold,Harleston, Beccles and Norwich.Connections have to be made for Lowestoft,Ipswich,Great Yarmouth and Diss. Until 1984 Bungay centre has congested with heavy traffic, but in this year the long-awaited by-pass was completed.This now alleviates the problem.By considerably reducing traffic congestion,pollution and travellers unnecessary time and trouble.The by-pass has proved to be a great asset to Bungay. The decision to build the by-pass was made in 1980, the planning and building took about 4 years altogether. It has opened 11 months ahead of schedule.
